description:
Implement Admin Dashboard for User Account Management and Agent Monitoring

Create an administrative interface that enables administrators to manage user accounts and monitor agent health to proactively prevent system failures.

Requirements:

User Account Management:
- Provide ability to view all user accounts in a searchable/filterable list
- Enable editing of user account details (email, username, role, permissions, status)
- Add ability to activate/deactivate user accounts
- Implement password reset functionality for users
- Log all account modifications with timestamp and admin identifier
- Add confirmation dialogs for destructive actions

Agent Monitoring:
- Display real-time status of all agents (online, offline, error states)
- Show key health metrics (uptime, response time, error rate, resource usage)
- Implement alerting system for agent failures or degraded performance
- Provide historical logs of agent activity and failures
- Add ability to manually restart or reset failing agents
- Set configurable thresholds for automatic alerts

Improvements to Consider:
- Add dashboard widgets showing summary statistics
- Implement role-based access control for admin functions
- Create audit trail for all administrative actions
- Add bulk operations for managing multiple users/agents
- Include export functionality for reports and logs
- Ensure all operations handle errors gracefully with clear feedback
- Add search and filtering capabilities for large datasets

Success Criteria:
- Admins can modify user accounts without requiring backend access
- System proactively alerts admins before agents fail completely
- All administrative actions are logged and auditable
- Interface loads and responds within 2 seconds under normal load
title: Build Admin Dashboard for User and Agent Management
